column2: depending whose turn it is.●Your turn: Add 1 "Amazement" card from your Deck to your hand.●Your opponent's turn: Set 1 "Attraction" Trap directly from your Deck. It can be activated this turn.You can only activate 1 "Amazing Time Ticket" per turn.$Supports archetypes /Amazement/Attraction$$Adds from Deck to hand/Sets from your Deck$Effect/Condition$
